arts.ttl: Sergio Ramos sent off again! His 30 career red cards, from Real Madrid to Monterrey
arts.sum: Sergio Ramos received career red card No. 30 in Monterrey's win at Pumas. Here's how he earned each one, including the 26 he got while at Real Madrid.

arts.ttl: Monterrey's Sergio Ramos gets 30th career red
arts.sum: Sergio Ramos was sent off in the final minutes of Monterrey's victory over UNAM on Sunday, his first dismissal since he moved to Liga MX.

arts.ttl: Pumas Act Fast to Appoint Gustavo Lema's Successor
arts.sum: Most of his career was spent in Mexico, representing Club América and Monterrey, representing Los Rayados 139 times in five years. During his playing days, Juárez lifted the Liga MX title twice, once with América in 2013 after doing so with his boyhood club in 2009.
